original: 蜀郡江原人，歷仕蜀漢、西晉。為官清廉、治獄公允。蜀漢滅亡之際，諸郡縣動盪，棄官擅離職守者多不勝數，常勗卻仍堅守城池，直至劉禪投降。
text: A native of Jiangyuan, Shujun, who has been in Shuhan and Western Jin Dynasty. Honest officials and fair prison governance. When the Shuhan fell, the counties and counties were in turmoil, and there were countless people who abandoned their official positions and left their posts without permission. However, Chang Xu still held on to the city until Liu Chan surrendered.
